summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for disposition of certain monies sized and forfeited and proceeds of the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited pursuant to the Uniform Controlled Substances Act; accepting such forfeitures; appropriating such monies to reimburse expenses incurred by the Police and Law Departments and to expand programs of the Police and Law Departments to enforce narcotic and other drug enforcement laws; and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1996 Budgets of the Police and Law Departments by reimbursable appropriation from the General Fund by three-fourths vote.
